# Recordset.Net
Recordset.Net is a library to convert .NET POCOs to ADODB.Recordsets.


IMPORTANT:
Please note that in order to use Recordset.Net, you need to add a COM reference
to "Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 2.8 Library" to your project.


See http://christianspecht.de/recordset-net for more information about Recordset.Net.
